post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
Permanent 또는 Contract 로 직장을 찾는 분들께.....

CM Inc. 에서 아래와 같이 사람을 찾습니다.
                          

Career Opportunities

CM Inc. is seeking skilled Personnel for both permanent and contract positions in the following Information Technology fields.

Please e-mail your resume to: cminc@interlog.com and our recruitment representative will contact you if your skills match our job requirements:

o CRM Principal
o E-commerce Principal using MS technology
o Sun Unix Administrator
o Senior HP-UNIX Systems Administrator
o Remedy Approved Consultants
o Advanced Java Programmers
o Sr. Architects specializing in MS environments
o Sr. Web Business Application Developers
o Sr. Cobol DB2/IMS Programmer
o Sr. Software Engineer/Object Oriented Designer
o Java Application/System Architect
o Java Developers
o IT Manager (AS/400 with background in brokerage/securities)
o Contract RF/IF Engineer
o Full time RF/IF Engineer
o Senior AS/400 Programmer Analyst
o MS Architect
o Oracle Developers


Contact Information :

CM Inc.
2800 John Street, Suite # 19
Markham, Ontario, Canada
L3R 2W2

Attn.: Ali
Phone: 905-475-2248 #239
Fax:   905-475-2275
Web.: http://www.cmigroup.com/career_opportunities/index_career.html
E-mail: cminc@interlog.com
post.title: [2000/4/7] Job Career Opportunities (Member)
